Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2007 03:46PM spicekitty wrote: I JUST GOT THE BAD NEWS FROM MY BIOPSY AND AM SCHEDULED FOR MRI MONDAY THEN MASTECTOMY ON MARCH 2. I AM SCARED TO DEATH. I ALSO HAVE BI-POLAR AND AM WORRIED HOW WELL I'M GOING TO COPE WITH IT ALL. HAVE SO MANY QUESTIONS, BUT THIS WEBSITE IS GREAT. MY SURGEON IS GOING TO BE DR. SCWALKE IN SHREVEPORT, LA. HE IS SUPPOSSED TO BE THE BEST. AND I REALLY LIKE HIME. HE HAS A VERY UNDERSTANDING, CALM, SWEET BEDSIDE MANNER.
